verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהֹוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּר֮ <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> about בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel וְיָשֻׁ֗בוּ <WH7725> that they turn וְיַחֲנוּ֙ <WH2583> and encamp לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> before פִּ֣י הַחִירֹ֔ת <WH6367> Pihahiroth בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between מִגְדֹּ֖ל <WH4024> between Migdol וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> and the sea לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> over against בַּ֣עַל צְפֹ֔ן <WH1189> Baalzephon נִכְח֥וֹ <WH5226> before תַחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> it shall ye encamp עַל־ <WH5921> by הַיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> by the sea

וְאָמַ֤ר <WH559> will say פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> For Pharaoh לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel נְבֻכִ֥ים <WH943> They [are] entangled הֵ֖ם <WH1992> in בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the land סָגַ֥ר <WH5462> hath shut them in עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> the wilderness

וְחִזַּקְתִּ֣י <WH2388> And I will harden אֶת־ <WH853> לֵב־ <WH3820> heart פַּרְעֹה֮ <WH6547> Pharaoh's וְרָדַ֣ף <WH7291> that he shall follow אַחֲרֵיהֶם֒ <WH310> after וְאִכָּבְדָ֤ה <WH3513> them and I will be honoured בְּפַרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> upon Pharaoh וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> and all חֵיל֔וֹ <WH2426> army וְיָדְע֥וּ <WH3045> may know מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4713> Egyptian כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> And they did כֵֽן׃ <WH3651> so

וַיֻּגַּד֙ <WH5046> And it was told לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt כִּ֥י <WH3588> for בָרַ֖ח <WH1272> fled הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> that the people וַ֠יֵּהָפֵךְ <WH2015> was turned לְבַ֨ב <WH3824> and the heart פַּרְעֹ֤ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh וַעֲבָדָיו֙ <WH5650> and of his servants אֶל־ <WH413> toward הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> against the people וַיֹּֽאמרוּ֙ <WH559> and they said מַה־ <WH4100> What זֹּ֣את <WH2063> we עָשִׂ֔ינוּ <WH6213> Why have we done כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שִׁלַּ֥חְנוּ <WH7971> go אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> this that we have let Israel מֵעָבְדֵֽנוּ׃ <WH5647> from serving
וַיֶּאְסֹ֖ר <WH631> And he made ready אֶת־ <WH853> רִכְבּ֑וֹ <WH7393> his chariot וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> his people לָקַ֥ח <WH3947> and took עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> and he

וַיִּקַּ֗ח <WH3947> And he took שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> six מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred רֶ֙כֶב֙ <WH7393> chariots בָּח֔וּר <WH970> young וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and all רֶ֣כֶב <WH7393> and all the chariots מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְשָׁלִשִׁ֖ם <WH7991> and captains עַל־ <WH5921> over כֻּלּֽוֹ׃ <WH3605> all

וַיְחַזֵּ֣ק <WH2388> hardened יְהֹוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> לֵ֤ב <WH3820> the heart פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> of Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וַיִּרְדֹּ֕ף <WH7291> and he pursued אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel יֹצְאִ֖ים <WH3318> went out בְּיָ֥ד <WH3027> hand רָמָֽה׃ <WH7311> with an high

וַיִּרְדְּפ֨וּ <WH7291> pursued מִצְרַ֜יִם <WH4713> Egyptian אַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ם <WH310> after וַיַּשִּׂ֤יגוּ <WH5381> and overtook אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> חֹנִ֣ים <WH2583> them encamping עַל־ <WH5921> beside הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> by the sea כָּל־ <WH3605> them all סוּס֙ <WH5483> them all the horses רֶ֣כֶב <WH7393> [and] chariots פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh וּפָרָשָׁ֖יו <WH6571> and his horsemen וְחֵיל֑וֹ <WH2428> and his army עַל־ <WH5921> beside פִּי֙ הַֽחִירֹ֔ת <WH6367> beside Pihahiroth לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before בַּ֥עַל צְפֹֽן׃ <WH1189> Baalzephon

וּפַרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> And when Pharaoh הִקְרִ֑יב <WH7126> drew nigh וַיִּשְׂאוּ֩ <WH5375> lifted up בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינֵיהֶ֜ם <WH5869> their eyes וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold מִצְרַ֣יִם ׀ <WH4713> Egyptian נֹסֵ֣עַ <WH5265> marched אַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ם <WH310> after וַיִּֽירְאוּ֙ <WH3372> afraid מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> them and they were sore וַיִּצְעֲק֥וּ <WH6817> cried out בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֮ <WH559> And they said אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁה֒ <WH4872> unto Moses הַֽמִבְּלִ֤י <WH1097> corruption אֵין־ <WH369> there קְבָרִים֙ <WH6913> Because [there were] no graves בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> in Egypt לְקַחְתָּ֖נוּ <WH3947> hast thou taken us away לָמ֣וּת <WH4191> to die בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> desert מַה־ <WH4100> how long זֹּאת֙ <WH2063> have you עָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> hast thou dealt לָּ֔נוּ לְהוֹצִיאָ֖נוּ <WH3318> thus with us to carry us forth מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> Egypt

הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> not זֶ֣ה <WH2088> is this הַדָּבָ֗ר <WH1697> [Is] not this the word אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> we דִּבַּ֨רְנוּ <WH1696> that we did tell אֵלֶ֤יךָ <WH413> to you בְמִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> thee in Egypt לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying חֲדַ֥ל <WH2308> Let us alone מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> alone וְנַֽעַבְדָ֣ה <WH5647> that we may serve אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4713> Egyptian כִּ֣י <WH3588> for ט֥וֹב <WH2896> good לָ֙נוּ֙ עֲבֹ֣ד <WH5647> for us to serve אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4713> Egyptian מִמֻּתֵ֖נוּ <WH4191> than that we should die בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> in the wilderness

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָם֮ <WH5971> unto the people אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָאוּ֒ <WH3372> Fear הִֽתְיַצְב֗וּ <WH3320> ye not stand still וּרְאוּ֙ <WH7200> and see אֶת־ <WH853> יְשׁוּעַ֣ת <WH3444> the salvation יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> which he will shew לָכֶ֖ם הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> to you to day כִּ֗י <WH3588> for אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom רְאִיתֶ֤ם <WH7200> whom ye have seen אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4713> Egyptian הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> to day לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תֹסִ֛יפוּ <WH3254> them again לִרְאֹתָ֥ם <WH7200> ye shall see ע֖וֹד <WH5750> more עַד־ <WH5704> no more for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever
יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD יִלָּחֵ֣ם <WH3898> shall fight לָכֶ֑ם וְאַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you תַּחֲרִישֽׁוּן׃ <WH2790> for you and ye shall hold your peace פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses מַה־ <WH4100> Why תִּצְעַ֖ק <WH6817> Wherefore criest אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to דַּבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> thou unto me? speak אֶל־ <WH413> about בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וְיִסָּֽעוּ׃ <WH5265> that they go forward

וְאַתָּ֞ה <WH859> you הָרֵ֣ם <WH7311> But lift thou up אֶֽת־ <WH853> מַטְּךָ֗ <WH4294> thy rod וּנְטֵ֧ה <WH5186> and stretch out אֶת־ <WH853> יָדְךָ֛ <WH3027> thine hand עַל־ <WH5921> over הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> over the sea וּבְקָעֵ֑הוּ <WH1234> and divide וְיָבֹ֧אוּ <WH935> shall go בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> it and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> [ground] through the midst הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> of the sea בַּיַּבָּשָֽׁה׃ <WH3004> on dry

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> I הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> behold מְחַזֵּק֙ <WH2388> And I behold I will harden אֶת־ <WH853> לֵ֣ב <WH3820> the hearts מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4713> Egyptian וְיָבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and they shall follow אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH310> them וְאִכָּבְדָ֤ה <WH3513> and I will get me honour בְּפַרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> upon Pharaoh וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> and all חֵיל֔וֹ <WH2426> army בְּרִכְבּ֖וֹ <WH7393> upon his chariots וּבְפָרָשָֽׁיו׃ <WH6571> and upon his horsemen

וְיָדְע֥וּ <WH3045> shall know מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4713> Egyptian כִּי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD בְּהִכָּבְדִ֣י <WH3513> when I have gotten me honour בְּפַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> upon Pharaoh בְּרִכְבּ֖וֹ <WH7393> upon his chariots וּבְפָרָשָֽׁיו׃ <WH6571> and upon his horsemen

וַיִּסַּ֞ע <WH5265> removed מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> And the angel הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God הַהֹלֵךְ֙ <WH1980> which went לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> before מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> the camp יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> and went מֵאַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH310> behind וַיִּסַּ֞ע <WH5265> went עַמּ֤וּד <WH5982> them and the pillar הֶֽעָנָן֙ <WH6051> of the cloud מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> from before their face וַיַּֽעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> and stood מֵאַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH310> behind

וַיָּבֹ֞א <WH935> And it came בֵּ֣ין ׀ <WH996> between מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> between the camp מִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> of the Egyptians וּבֵין֙ <WH996> between מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> and the camp יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become הֶֽעָנָן֙ <WH6051> and it was a cloud וְהַחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <WH2822> and darkness וַיָּ֖אֶר <WH215> [to them] but it gave light אֶת־ <WH853> הַלָּ֑יְלָה <WH3915> by night וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not קָרַ֥ב <WH7126> [to these] so that the one came not near זֶ֛ה <WH2088> the other אֶל־ <WH413> about זֶ֖ה <WH2088> the other כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַלָּֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> all the night

וַיֵּ֨ט <WH5186> stretched out מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> יָדוֹ֮ <WH3027> his hand עַל־ <WH5921> over הַיָּם֒ <WH3220> over the sea וַיּ֣וֹלֶךְ <WH1980> swept יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> and the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֠יָּם <WH3220> caused the sea בְּר֨וּחַ <WH7307> wind קָדִ֤ים <WH6921> east עַזָּה֙ <WH5794> [back] by a strong כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַלַּ֔יְלָה <WH3915> all that night וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> and made אֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> the sea לֶחָרָבָ֑ה <WH2724> dry וַיִּבָּקְע֖וּ <WH1234> were divided הַמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> [land] and the waters

וַיָּבֹ֧אוּ <WH935> went בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> into the midst הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> of the sea בַּיַּבָּשָׁ֑ה <WH3004> upon the dry וְהַמַּ֤יִם <WH4325> [ground] and the waters לָהֶם֙ חֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> [were] a wall מִֽימִינָ֖ם <WH3225> unto them on their right hand וּמִשְּׂמֹאלָֽם׃ <WH8040> and on their left

וַיִּרְדְּפ֤וּ <WH7291> pursued מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4713> Egyptian וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> and went in אַחֲרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH310> after כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> and all ס֣וּס <WH5483> horses פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> [even] all Pharaoh's רִכְבּ֖וֹ <WH7393> his chariots וּפָרָשָׁ֑יו <WH6571> and his horsemen אֶל־ <WH413> into תּ֖וֹךְ <WH8432> them to the midst הַיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> of the sea

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become בְּאַשְׁמֹ֣רֶת <WH821> watch הַבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> And it came to pass that in the morning וַיַּשְׁקֵ֤ף <WH8259> looked יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> on מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> unto the host מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4713> Egyptian בְּעַמּ֥וּד <WH5982> through the pillar אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> of fire וְעָנָ֑ן <WH6051> and of the cloud וַיָּ֕הָם <WH2000> and troubled אֵ֖ת <WH853> מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> the host מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4713> Egyptian

וַיָּ֗סַר <WH5493> And took off אֵ֚ת <WH853> אֹפַ֣ן <WH212> wheels מַרְכְּבֹתָ֔יו <WH4818> their chariot וַֽיְנַהֲגֵ֖הוּ <WH5090> that they drave בִּכְבֵדֻ֑ת <WH3517> them heavily וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said מִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4713> Egyptian אָנ֙וּסָה֙ <WH5127> Let us flee מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> from the face יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּ֣י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> for the LORD נִלְחָ֥ם <WH3898> fighteth לָהֶ֖ם בְּמִצְרָֽיִם <WH4713> Egyptian פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses נְטֵ֥ה <WH5186> Stretch out אֶת־ <WH853> יָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> thine hand עַל־ <WH5921> over הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> over the sea וְיָשֻׁ֤בוּ <WH7725> may come again הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> that the waters עַל־ <WH5921> over מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4713> Egyptian עַל־ <WH5921> over רִכְבּ֖וֹ <WH7393> upon their chariots וְעַל־ <WH5921> over פָּרָשָֽׁיו׃ <WH6571> and upon their horsemen

וַיָּשֻׁ֣בוּ <WH7725> returned הַמַּ֗יִם <WH4325> And the waters וַיְכַסּ֤וּ <WH3680> and covered אֶת־ <WH853> הָרֶ֙כֶב֙ <WH7393> the chariots וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּ֣רָשִׁ֔ים <WH6571> and the horsemen לְכֹל֙ <WH3605> entire חֵ֣יל <WH2426> army פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh הַבָּאִ֥ים <WH935> that came אַחֲרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH310> after בַּיָּ֑ם <WH3220> into the sea לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not נִשְׁאַ֥ר <WH7604> them there remained בָּהֶ֖ם עַד־ <WH5704> not so much as אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one

וּבְנֵ֧י <WH1121> But the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel הָלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> walked בַיַּבָּשָׁ֖ה <WH3004> upon dry בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> [land] in the midst הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> of the sea וְהַמַּ֤יִם <WH4325> and the waters לָהֶם֙ חֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> [were] a wall מִֽימִינָ֖ם <WH3225> unto them on their right hand וּמִשְּׂמֹאלָֽם <WH8040> and on their left
